description:
Zo Zo and Isamu steal Professor Honeoriâ€™s Delicious-izer machine for their cooking. Zo Zo tries out a new video game, which turns out to be Mr. Demon in disguise who tricks Zo Zo and traps him inside his game! Isamu starts sleepwalking and Zo Zo must follow him to save him. Zo Zo falls asleep during a marathon chess session, and dreams he is the King of a medieval castle under attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zo Zo Zombie: Chapter Twenty Four
